title: Issa Hell Of An Episode
itunes:title: Issa Hell Of An Episode
description:
TV personality and sports journalist Stephen A. Smith, comedian Flame Monroe and actor John Boyega debate the week’s top stories with Charlamagne Tha God. Plus, actress, writer and producer Issa Rae stops by for a candid conversation
